settings.text:
Privacy Policy

Our privacy policy contains all aspects of how we would use the personal information of users on our website. The user’s privacy is taken seriously, and we do all in our power to protect it in any way we can. We do not share your personal information with anyone. The customer’s personal information will only be used concerning their order or query at Nimra Kashif. The customer’s personal information is stored at our data server which may only be used for data analysis and improvement. We will never sell or reshare our user’s information with anyone without prior consent.

We, however, like any other online website, are prone to an unforeseeable vulnerability that may cause a breach in data. In such circumstances, the company shall not be liable for any economic loss of any form. This includes consequential loss or damage, loss to purchasers, or third parties.

Password and Security

The user is responsible to maintain full confidentiality of their account and password or any activity performed under it. The company shall not be responsible for any loss or damage that may arise due to a failure to protect account information by the user.

Consent

By using our website, Nimra Kashif, the user consents to our privacy policy and all the terms and conditions that have been set herein.

Modification

We may amend or modify the product details, contents, and/or the terms and conditions of this website and your access and use thereof as may be necessary from time to time.

Intellectual Property

The user acknowledges and agrees that all copyright, design, trademarks, and any intellectual property or material owned by Nimra Kashif and the website shall remain their property at all times. All intellectual property of Nimra Kashif and the website are protected by federal law. The user may access the content or intellectual property for non-commercial use only. The user does not have permission to copy, modify, publish, create from, or exploit in any manner or any social media platform.
